timeline.message:
Update tags in GenericContainerRuleTest

This will fix incompatibility of Docker with WSL2 backend with outdated images.

Update tag in SimpleMariaDBTest

Also add section about WSL2 to docs.

timeline.bodyText:
I wonder - should we take the opportunity to clean up this test class a bit?
Way back at the beginning of the project I wanted to test/demonstrate that diverse images could be used - partly to serve as documentation. Now, though, I think these are no longer truly necessary and just add extra image pull time to our build.
Thoughts?
timeline.author: rnorth

replies.bodyText: I believe this would help reducing the tests time a lot 👍
replies.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText: Was thinking the same when touching this class. Maybe the class as a whole is nowadays redundant.
replies.author: kiview

replies.bodyText: Since this is not really related anymore, I will rever this changes and we can do it in a separate cleanup PR.
replies.author: kiview
